DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Barrier Spray (2 oz pump)
DescriptionData.Description:
Mehron Barrier Spray is a clear, alcohol-based liquid that both sets makeup and protects sensitive skin from makeup, latex and adhesives. Apply to clean skin before makeup to prevent sweat from coming through the makeup or spray over face paint to minimize rubbing off on costumes. 2 oz. pump spray bottle.
Sorry, no Air, Priority or International shipping on this item.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Mehron Barrier Spray, 2 oz pump bottle
Protects sensitive skin from makeup, latex, and adhesives
Protects makeup from sweat, or can be sprayed over makeup to minimize rub-off
No air, priority, or international shipping on this item
